name: Evil Green Boxes
description:
This is another fun little game I've made when learning to use the Unreal Engine. This is a kind of zombies game but with boxes. As you play your score goes up but so do the amount of green boxes chasing you, and they get faster :D. How long can you survive?

I would like to give a special thanks to Matthew Palaje  for the tutorials to make this possible.

If anything goes wrong or if you have any questions please throw me a message.
